text: Anɨgɨl agɨlak, anɨb ak tek chɨn bɨ olap nɨŋɨd dɨnɨgun agak. Bɨ anɨb ak bɨ yokɨp olap mel, bɨ chɨn ayɨp pel ajɨl, Jon Jisas nop ñɨg pakñak ak nɨŋɨd, mɨd dad amɨl, Jisas kumɨl tɨkjakek God nop dad man ne alaŋ amek nɨgak bɨ olap nɨŋɨd dɨnɨgun agak. Bɨ anɨb ak tek don nɨm, chɨn ayɨp mɨdɨl, bɨawl Jisas kumɨl tɨkjakak takaw ak agñɨnɨgabun agak.
